Verses: 1 pinbu Avar Kenesareththuk Kadalaruge Nindrapodhu, Thiralaana Janangal Dhevavasanaththaik Ketkumpadi Avaridaththil Nerunginaargal.
2 appozhudhu Kadarkaraiyile Nindra Irandu Padavugalaik Kandaar. Meenpidikkiravargal Avaigalai Vittirangi, Valaigalai Alasikkondirundhaargal.

3 appozhudhu Andhappadavugalil Ondril Erinaar, Adhu Seemonudaiyadhaayirundhadhu; Adhaik Karaiyilirundhu Satre Thallumpadi Avanaik Kettukkondu, Andhappadavil Utkaarndhu, Janangalukkup Podhagampanninaar.
4 avar Podhagampanni Mudiththapinbu Seemonai Nokki: Aazhaththile Thallikkondupoi, Meenpidikkumpadi Ungal Valaigalaip Podungal Endraar.
5 adharkuch Seemon: Aiyare, Raamuzhuvadhum Naangal Pirayaasappattum Ondrum Agappadavillai; Aagilum Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Valaiyaip Podugiren Endraan.
6 andhappadiye Avargal Seydhu, Thangal Valai Kizhindhupokaththakkadhaaga Migudhiyaana Meengalaip Pidiththaargal.
7 appozhudhu Matrap Padavilirundha Koottaaligal Vandhu Thangalukku Udhaviseyyumpadikkuch Saigaikaattinaargal; Avargal Vandhu, Irandu Padavugalum Amizhaththakkadhaaga Nirappinaargal.
8 seemon Pedhuru Adhaikkandu, Yesuvin Paadhaththil Vizhundhu: Aandavare, Naan Paaviyaana Manushan, Neer Ennaivittup Pogavendum Endraan.
9 avargal Thiralaana Meengalaip Pidiththadhinimiththam, Avanukkum Avanodukooda Irundha Yaavarukkum Piramippundaanapadiyaal Appatich Sonnaan.

10 seemonukkuk Koottaaligalaana Sebedheyuvin Kumaararaagiya Yaakkobum Yovaanum Andhabpadiye Piramiththaargal. Appozhudhu Yesu Seemonai Nokki: Bayappadaadhe, Idhumudhal Nee Manusharaip Pidikkiravanaayiruppaai Endraar.
11 avargal Padavugalaik Karaiyile Kondupoi Niruththi, Ellaavatraiyum Vittu, Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.

12 pinbu Avar Oru Pattanaththil Irukkaiyil, Kushtarogam Niraindha Oru Manushan Yesuvaikkandu, Muganguppura Vizhundhu: Aandavare, Umakkuch Siththamaanaal Ennaich Suththamaakka Ummaale Aagum Endru Avarai Vendikkondaan.
13 avar Thamadhukaiyai Neetti, Avanaith Thottu: Enakkuch Siththamundu Suththamaagu Endraar; Udane Kushtarogam Avanai Vittu Neengitru.

14 avar Avanai Nokki: Nee Idhai Oruvarukkum Sollaamal, Poi, Unnai Aasaariyanukkuk Kaanbiththu, Nee Suththamaanadhinimiththam, Mose Kattalaiyittapadiye, Avargalukkuch Saatchiyaagap Bali Seluththu Endru Kattalaiyittaar.

15 appadiyirundhum Avarudaiya Keerththi Adhigamaagap Parambitru. Thiralaana Janangal Avarudaiya Ubadhesaththaik Ketpadharkum Avaraale Thangal Pinigal Neengich Savukkiyamadaivadharkum Koodivandhaargal.
16 avaro Vanaandharaththil Thaniththup Poi, Jebampannikkondirundhaar.

17 pinbu Orunaal Avar Ubadhesiththukkondirukkirapodhu, Galileyaa Yoodheyaa Naadugalilulla Sagala Giraamangalilum, Erusalem Nagaraththilumirundhu Vandha Pariseyarum Niyaayasaasdhirigalum Utkaarndhirundhaargal; Appozhudhu Piniyaaligalaik Kunamaakkaththakkadhaagak Karththarudaiya Vallamai Vilangitru.
18 appozhudhu Sila Manushar Thimirvaadhakkaaran Oruvanaip Padukkaiyode Eduththukkonduvandhu, Avanai Ullekondupogavum Avar Munbaaga Vaikkavum Vagaidhedinaargal.

19 janakkoottam Migudhiyaayirundhapadiyaal Avanai Ulle Kondupogiradharku Vakaikaanaamal, Veettinmel Eri, Thattotukal Vazhiyaai Janangalin Maththiyil Yesuvukku Munpaaga Avanaip Padukkaiyode Irakkinaargal.
20 avargaludaiya Visuvaasaththai Avar Kandu, Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Nokki: Manushane, Un Paavangal Unakku Mannikkappattadhu Endraar.
21 appozhudhu Vedhapaaragarum Pariseyarum Yosanaipanni, Dhevadhooshanam Sollugira Ivan Yaar? Dhevan Oruvareyandrip Paavangalai Mannikkaththakkavar Yaar Endraargal.
22 yesu Avargal Sindhanaigalai Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Ungal Irudhayangalil Neengal Sindhikkiradhenna?
23 un Paavangal Unakku Mannikkappattadhu Endru Solvadho, Ezhundhu Nadavendru Solvadho, Edhu Elidhu?

24 boomiyile Paavangalai Mannikka Manushakumaaranukku Adhikaaram Undenpadhai Neengal Ariyavendumendru Solli, Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu, Un Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu, Un Veettukkup Po Endru Unakkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
25 udane Avan Avargalukku Munbaaga Ezhundhu, Than Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththi, Than Veettukkup Ponaan.
26 adhinaale Ellaarum Aachchariyappattu, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal; Allaamalum, Avargal Bayam Niraindhavargalaagi, Adhisayamaana Kaariyangalai Indru Kandom Endraargal.
27 ivaigalukkup Pinbu, Avar Purappattu, Aayaththuraiyil Utkaarndhirundha Levi Ennum Perudaiya Oru Aayakkaaranaik Kandu: Enakkup Pinsendru Vaa Endraar.
28 avan Ellaavatraiyum Vittu, Ezhundhu, Avarukkup Pinsendraan.
29 andha Levi Enbavan Than Veettile Avarukkup Periya Virundhupanninaan. Anega Aayakkaararum Matravargalum Avargalodekoodap Pandhiyirundhaargal.
30 vedhapaaragarum Pariseyarum Avarudaiya Seesharukku Virodhamaaga Murumuruththu: Neengal Aayakkaararodum Paavigalodum Pojanapaanampannukiradhennavendru Kettaargal.
31 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Piniyaalikalukku Vaiththiyan Vendiyadheyallaamal Sugamullavargalukku Vendiyadhillai.
32 needhimaangalaiyalla, Paavigalaiye Manandhirumbugiradharku Azhaikka Vandhen Endraar.

33 pinbu Avargal Avarai Nokki: Yovaanudaiya Seeshar Anekandharam Ubavaasiththu Jebampannikkonduvarukiraargal, Pariseyarudaiya Seesharum Appadiye Seykiraargal, Ummudaiya Seeshar Pojanapaanampannukiraargale, Adheppadiyendru Kettaargal.
34 adharku Avar: Manavaalan Thangalodirukkaiyil Manavaalanudaiya Thozhargalai Neengal Ubavaasikkach Seyyakkoodumaa?
35 manavaalan Avargalai Vittu Edupadum Naatkal Varum, Andha Naatkalile Ubavaasippaargal Endraar.

36 avargalukku Oru Uvamaiyaiyumsonnaar: Oruvanum Pudhiya Vasdhiraththundaip Pazhaiya Vasdhiraththinmel Pottu Inaikkamaattaan, Inaiththaal Pudhiyadhu Pazhaiyadhaik Kizhikkum; Pudhiyavasdhiraththundu Pazhaiya Vasdhiraththukku Ovvaadhu.
37 oruvanum Pudhu Thiraatcharasaththaip Pazhandhuruththigalil Vaarththuvaikkamaattaan: Vaarththuvaiththaal Pudhurasam Thuruththigalaik Kizhiththuppodum, Rasamum Sindhippom, Thuruththigalum Kettuppom.
38 pudhu Rasaththaip Pudhu Thuruththigalil Vaarththuvaikkavendum, Appozhudhu Irandum Paththirappattirukkum.
39 andriyum Oruvanum Pazhaiya Rasaththaik Kudiththavudane Pudhu Rasaththai Virumbamaattaan, Pazhaiya Rasame Nalladhendru Solluvaan Endraar.
